required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ultrasound B Mode Imaging and Elastography
clinical_study.official_title: Ultrasound B Mode Imaging and Elastography During Administration of Xiaflex (Collagenase Clostridium Histolyticum) for Dupuytren's Contracture: A Pilot Study (The UBIEX-DC Study)

brief_summary.textblock: A Pilot Study on Ultrasound B mode Imaging and Elastography during administration of Xiaflex (collagenase clostridium histolyticum) for Dupuytren's contracture.

detailed_description.textblock: Ultrasound analysis will be obtained on patient that receives Xiaflex as standard of care for Dupuytren's contracture

primary_outcome.measure: Ultrasound B mode Imaging and Elastography
primary_outcome.description: A Pilot Study: Ultrasound B mode Imaging and Elastography during administration of Xiaflex

arm_group.arm_group_label: Normals, Dupuytren's subjects with and without treatment
arm_group.description: Ultrasound analysis of patient receiving treatment for Dupuytren's

study_pop.textblock:
Three groups of people will take part in the research:
5-Normal subjects without a Dupuytren's contracture 5-Subjects that have a hand Dupuytren's contracture that will not receive tx 10-Subjects that have a hand Dupuytren's contracture that will receive tx

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Normal Hand or Hand Dupuytren's contracture
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous treatment of Dupuytren's cord

facility.name: The Center for Rheumatology and Bone Research a division of Arthritis and Rheumatism Associates, P.C.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Principal Investigator Paul J. DeMarco, MD
